data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ng, Peter K. L., Castro, Peter (2016): Revision of the family Chasmocarcinidae Serène, 1964 (Crustacea, Brachyura, Goneplacoidea).
